tuv.seg: Case study 2: Family Income Supplement (FIS)
Cás-staidéar 2: Forlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh (FIT)
This is an example showing how income is assessed for Family Income Supplement in 2017
Seo sampla a thaispeánann conas a ríomhtar ioncam i leith Forlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh í 2017
John is living with his partner Mary and their four children
Tá John ina chónaí lena pháirtí Máire agus lena gceathrar leanaí
He has been working for a company for some time but his hours are irregular, varying from 30 to 48 hours per week
Tá sé ag obair do chuideachta le tamall maith, ach níl a chuid uaireanta oibre rialta. Téann siad idir 30 agus 48 uair an chloig in aghaidh na seachtaine
As a result, he can earn between €300 and €480 gross per week
Mar thoradh air sin, is féidir leis idir €300 agus €480 in ollphá a thuilleamh gach seachtain
Mary is getting Carer’s Allowance of €209 and also works part-time as a home-help for the Health Service Executive (HSE) earning €96 per week
Tá Mary ag fáil €209 de Liúntas Cúramóra agus oibríonn sí go páirtaimseartha mar chúntóir baile do Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte |(FSS) ag tuilleamh €96 in aghaidh na seachtaine
Their daughter is 15 years old and has a part-time job at the weekend, earning €45 per week
Tá a n-iníon 15 bliana d’aois agus tá post páirtaimseartha aici ag an deireadh seachtaine, ag tuilleamh €45 in aghaidh na seachtaine
John and Mary get Child Benefit of €560 per month for their four children
Faigheann John agus Mary Sochar Leanaí de €588 in aghaidh na míosa dá gceathrar leanaí
Weekly net income from employment (See note 1) €349.71 plus €96 = 445.71
Glanioncam seachtainiúil ó fhostaíocht (féach nóta 1) €349.71 agus €96 = €445.71
Add weekly net income from self-employment 0
Móide Glanioncam seachtainiúil ó fhéinfhostaíocht 0
Add social welfare payments (See note 2) €209
Móide Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh (Féach nóta 2) €209
Add Income from occupational pensions 0
Móide Ioncam ó Phinsin ghairme 0
The maximum income limit for a family with four children is €834
Is é an uasteorainn ioncaim i gcás teaghlaigh ina bhfuil ceathrar leanaí ná €834
The difference between €834 and €654.71 is €179.29
Is é an difear idir €834 agus €654.71 ná €179.29
60% of the difference is €107.57
Is é 60% den difríocht ná €107.57
John will get a FIS payment of €108 each week (rounded up to nearest euro)
Gheobhaidh John íocaíocht FIT de € €108 gach seachtain (slánaithe suas)
John’s hours are irregular and therefore the amount he earns can vary from week to week
Tá uaireanta John mírialta agus mar sin ní hionann an méid a thuilleann sé ó sheachtain go seachtain
To find his total weekly income the Department can average his income over a period of six to eight weeks
Chun a ioncam seachtainiúil iomlán a fháil, is féidir leis an Roinn meán a ioncaim thar thréimhse idir sé go hocht seachtaine a fháil
The most recent P60 is often used to calculate the average income from employment
Is minic a úsáidtear an P60 is déanaí chun an meán-ioncam ó fhostaíocht a ríomh
In this case, his income averaged out over six weeks is €349.71
Sa chás seo, is é a mheán-ioncam thar shé seachtaine ná €349.71
John’s income from employment is assessed and Mary’s casual income from working as a home help for the HSE is also assessed
Ní dhéantar measúnú ach ar ioncam John ó fhostaíocht
Their daughter’s income is not assessed because she is under 22 years of age and in full-time education
Ní mheasúnaítear ioncam a n-iníne toisc go bhfuil sí faoi bhun 22 bliain d’aois agus in oideachas lánaimseartha
Child Benefit is not included in the assessment of Family Income Supplement
Ní chuimsítear Sochar Leanaí sa mheasúnú d’Fhorlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh
However all of Mary's Carer's Allowance will be assessed as income - this is €209
Áfach, i 2016 déanfar measúnú den Liuntas Cúramóra Mhary mar ioncam – €209
